mmorpg.tooltip.item_modifiable_in_statio: Can be used inside Gear Modify Station
mmorpg.tooltip.player_levelup: If your experience bar is full, use this item to levelup!
mmorpg.tooltip.capacitor: Put Inside Repair Station to decrease fuel consumption.
mmorpg.tooltip.socketable_item: This Gem can be inserted into a Socket slot
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_spell_explosion: Casts an elemental projectile that does AOE dmg on hit.
mmorpg.tooltip.single_target_spell_bolt: Casts a Single Target elemental projectile.
mmorpg.tooltip.aoe_bomb_spell: Leaves out a bomb that explodes later for Aoe Damage.
mmorpg.tooltip.ele_bonus_atk_dmg_spell: Gives buff, deal bonus dmg at cost of mana.
mmorpg.tooltip.put_in_mapdevice: Right Click on Map Device to Use
item.patchouli.age_of_exile_guide.name: Age of Exile Guidebook
mmorpg.word.holdtopreventpickup: Hold in your hand to prevent item pickup.
mmorpg.word.item_modifiable_in_station: Can be used inside Modify Station
mmorpg.word.passivedesc: Casted when hit by mob at low health.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoidentifyfirst: Use to identify first item in inventory.
mmorpg.word.rightclicktoteleport: Use to teleport back from Adventure Map.
mmorpg.word.socketlvlisnthigherthaniteml: Socket lvl not higher than gear lvl
mmorpg.word.stormcloudspelldesc: Summons a storm cloud that deals damage over time.
mmorpg.word.useanidentifyscroll: An Identify Scroll can reveal it.
mmorpg.stat.heal_to_dmg: Heal Power applies to Spell Damage
mmorpg.chat.a_piece_of_gear_is_too_high_: You Don't meet requirements of a piece of current gear.
mmorpg.chat.can_not_go_over_maximum_leve: Can not go over maximum level
mmorpg.chat.dev_tools_enabled_contact_th: Devs tools enabled, if you see this please contact the author of Age of Exile [robertx22], he forgot to disable them!
mmorpg.chat.time_ran_out_due_to_permadea: Time ran out due to Permadeath
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.beast_blood.de: Accept the blood, suffer the Sacrifice. Be reborn anew.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.crown_of_eleme: Have you ever felt true power?
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.exec_pride.des: To miss is not an option.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.fifth_rider.de: The only thing that's missing is the horse.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.frost_crown.de: Everyone needs a proper burial, and I will make theirs dazzling.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.gluttony_helme: If only hunger could be sated, I would not be doomed.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.harbinger.desc: His eyes like black holes, his armor had the color of horizon.
Merge the Rivers of Mana and Magic, attain infinity, or die.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.jester_hat.des: One, two, three, fail. Whoops! One, two..
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.kingmaker.desc: Alone we falter, together we rise.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.ms_armor_chest: If only they knew that the inscription referred to the armor.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.angel_prot_n: If your guardian is careful enough, you just might think they don't exist.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.birth_miracl: Life can sometimes keep on giving.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.greed_persis: When desire for perfection overtakes your sanity, you too will be blessed.
They say the only way to take off this necklace is to rid yourself of your mortal flesh.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.loop_of_infi: Is it truly an end if everything just starts all over again? Maybe it really is just a loop.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.skull_of_spi: The mysterious skull contains knowledge of the contained spirits, but also their madness.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.snake_eye.de: Eternally dead, and yet not blind.
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.solar_ring.d: Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the brightest of them all?
item.mmorpg.uniques.jewelry.touch_of_ete: Worn by Kings, Beggars, Barbarians, Queens, Prophets and now ... you.
God might prefer peaceful means, but sometimes peace is not an option.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.eye_of_zegrat: A cultist once so powerful, even his remnant eye inflicts ills on others.
Found in a deep pit of ice. Many wands were shattered in attempts to imbue it.
The ability to wield thunder is said to come once in a millennium.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.obsi_might.de: This thirst for blood only seems lower than it's desire to taste burning flesh.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.rot_phys.desc: Strange things you find yourself liking. Like a stick, with a piece of rotten flesh on it.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.will_of_flora: Everything must be exactly as required.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.worldbearer.d: The ability to carry any burden is a heavy one.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.lifesprig.des: From the smallest seeds, to the tallest redwoods, life endures.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.the_poets_pen: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.redbeak.desc: As battle calms, blood turns to rust.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.limbsplit.des: Swinging through the air, it sings of sundered, severed, missing things.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.wanderlust.des: All the world is my home.
They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride. Some men have a longer stride than others.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.tearhaunch.des: We must prove our value to the One, by sating his hunger for life.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.stormcharger.d: Like lightning, the cavalry need never strike twice.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.goldwyrm.desc: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.
A single taste leaves you wanting more.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.goldrim.desc: No metal slips as easily through the fingers as gold.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.goldwrap.desc: Coddled by riches, he has no heart.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.thousand_ribbo: The night of a thousand ribbons.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.cloak_of_flame: He who sows an ember shall reap an inferno.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.solaris_lorica: Light the path to greatness, so that I may begin my bright pursuit.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.iron_heart.des: The council have a great many secrets. Some are better kept that way.
The light drove the darkness from our lands and from our hearts.
His mind was as quick and nimble as the fingers that drew his bowstring.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.heatshiver.des: Give of your heated passions. Give of your cold resolve. You will be repaid.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.alphas_howl.de: Nature respects the strong and paints the snow red with the blood of the weak.
A moment of victory may last an eternity in memory.
item.mmorpg.uniques.armor.the_baron.desc: The emperor's trusted surgeons are not the only ones who practice the dark arts.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.the_fetid_spr: A chilling hush, a scraping sound of things no more entombed in ground.
item.mmorpg.uniques.weapon.the_whisperin: Guard your darkest thoughts well, for they are the cracks through which the Nightmare crawls.
item.mmorpg.currency.crystal_of_truth.de: Transform Common Item into a Rare
item.mmorpg.currency.number_reroll.desc: Re-rolls explicit numbers on a gear
item.mmorpg.currency.stone_of_hope.desc: Transform any rarity gear into higher rarity
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_attributes: Adds to Dexterity, Intelligence and Strength.
mmorpg.stat_desc.all_ele_dmg: Increases All dmg of that element, both spells and attacks
mmorpg.stat_desc.armor: Decreases damage taken by a percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.burn_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Burning
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_burn: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_chill: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_poison: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chance_of_static: Chance to apply effect on weapon or spell hits.
mmorpg.stat_desc.chill_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Chilled
mmorpg.stat_desc.critical_hit: Chance to multiply damage by critical damage
mmorpg.stat_desc.damage_shield: Decreases that amount of damage from every attack.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dexterity_flat_stat_req: Alters stat requirements of this item.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_hunger: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_poison: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.dmg_under_wither: Increases your damage if you are under this status effect.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_atk_dmg: Adds x element damage on weapon hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_pene: Ignores that much resists, it works as subtraction.
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_resist: Stops X percent damage of that element
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_spell_damage: Spell power is used by spells and some other stats
mmorpg.stat_desc.ele_wep_damage: Increases elemental damage of x weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.elemental_focus: Increases Dmg for that element by a percent but decreases dmg from all other elements.
mmorpg.stat_desc.extra_mob_drops: Mobs with this stat drop extra loot when slain.
mmorpg.stat_desc.faster_cast_rate: Reduces amount of time needed to cast spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_effect_on_self: Affects all heal effects applied to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.heal_to_dmg: Adds your increased healing to your total spell damage.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_on_kill: Restore Health Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.health_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.hunger_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.increase_healing: Increases all types of healing recieved like health regen, lifesteal, life on hit, spell heals etc
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence: Increase Magic Shield and Mana and Mana regen.
mmorpg.stat_desc.intelligence_flat_stat_: Alters stat requirements of this item.
mmorpg.stat_desc.life_on_hit: Gives health on basic attack hit
mmorpg.stat_desc.lifesteal: Percent of basic attack DMG added to health
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_find: Adds chance for higher rarity of items
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield: Works like extra health. But regen is separate.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_on_kill: Restore Magic Shield Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_shield_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.magic_steal: Percent of basic attack DMG will restore magic shield.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana: Mana is used to cast spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_burn_resist: Protects against mana burn by x percent
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_cost_red: Reduces Mana Cost of all spells.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_on_kill: Restore Mana Every time you kill a mob
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_per_sec: Restore % of your total per regen tick.
mmorpg.stat_desc.mana_regen: Regen happens every few seconds but is also used for other stats or spells
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Poisoned
mmorpg.stat_desc.poison_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.slow_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
mmorpg.stat_desc.spell_damage: Increases DMG of all spells no matter the element
mmorpg.stat_desc.static_bonus_dmg: Increases dmg if enemy is affected by: Charged
mmorpg.stat_desc.strength_flat_stat_req: Alters stat requirements of this item.
mmorpg.stat_desc.turn_phys_to_ele: Turns % of phys atk dmg into ele
mmorpg.stat_desc.weapon_damage: Increases damage done if it was caused by that weapon
mmorpg.stat_desc.wither_immunity: This effect can't apply to you.
